summary: REQ-9 asks for an actual production deployment to the Internet Computer with a public HTTPS URL and verified core interactions. The diff only adds a deployment guide (and updates metadata/summary files) and does not provide evidence of an executed production deployment or a live URL.

missing_requirements.requirement: Publish the current Bhojpur Classic single-page marketing site live as a production deployment on the Internet Computer so it is accessible via a public URL (production deploy performed; public HTTPS URL provided; core interactions verified; no placeholder/preview-only references).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows documentation and metadata updates, but no evidence of an actual production deployment being performed and no public URL is included in the change set. A guide alone does not satisfy the acceptance criteria that a live HTTPS URL is provided and verified.
evidence: frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md (added, appears to be a guide; no evidence of actual deployment output or URL in diff summary)

hallucinated_features.description: Added a production deployment guide document.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-9 requires that a production deployment be performed and a public HTTPS URL be provided; adding a guide is not explicitly requested as an artifact and does not itself fulfill the requirement.
